moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Sky Attack
moves.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

moves.name: Sky Attack
moves.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.
